content.question: The distribution of the number of transactions per day at a certain automated teller machine <math alttext="A T M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>(ATM)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is approximately normal with a mean of 80 transactions and a standard deviation of 10 transactions. Which of the following represents the parameters of the distribution?

choices.label: <math alttext="x bar equals 80; s equals 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mn>80</mn><mo>;</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.6em"></mspace><mi>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x bar equals 80; s squared equals 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mo>;</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.6em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="x bar equals 80; sigma equals 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mo>;</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.6em"></mspace><mi>σ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="mu equals 80; sigma equals 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mo>;</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.6em"></mspace><mi>σ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="mu equals 80; s equals 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mo>;</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.6em"></mspace><mi>s</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="mu equals 80; sigma equals 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn><mo>;</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.6em"></mspace><mi>σ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Compare distributions or relative positions of points within a distribution.
